# pydiodon

[![pipeline status](https://gitlab.inria.fr/diodon/pydiodon/badges/master/pipeline.svg)](https://gitlab.inria.fr/diodon/pydiodon/-/commits/master)
[![coverage report](https://gitlab.inria.fr/diodon/pydiodon/badges/master/coverage.svg)](https://gitlab.inria.fr/diodon/pydiodon/-/commits/master)

## What it is ##

numpy library for linear dimension reduction, part of diodon project


## Documentation

The library is documented with Sphynx. html file is available at
